components: PARKING BRAKE,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,VISIBILITY,SEAT BELTS,STRUCTURE,LATCHES/LOCKS/LINKAGES
summary: THE CATALYTIC CONVERTER WAS REPLACED THREE TIMES DUE TO DETERIORATION. THE TRUNK LATCH, TIMING BELT, BALANCER BELT, AND THE POWER DOOR ACTUATOR WERE REPLACED, THE PARKING BRAKE WAS ADJUSTED, THE ARE REST AND AXLE SEAL WAS REPLACED, THE SEAT BELT FAILED TO RETRACT, AND THE WINDOWS RATTLED. *PH  *JB
